definition: to follow sb's example/to emulate/(of troops etc) to dress (come into alignment for parade formation)
to look after/to take care of/to watch/to guard
to see/to look at/to read/to watch/to visit/to call on/to consider/to regard as/to look after/to treat (an illness)/to depend on/to feel (that)/(after verb) to give it a try/Watch out! (for a danger)
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: This commitment stems naturally from the decision to align yourself with the polarity of unconditional love.
sentences.chinese: 這種承諾自然根源於你把自己與無私的愛的一極看齊。

sentences.english: Once made equal to man, woman becomes his superior.
sentences.chinese: 一旦使之與男人看齊的話，女人就會居其上了。

sentences.english: Management wisdom dictates that everyone needs to benchmark themselves against best practice.
sentences.chinese: 管理智慧認爲，所有的人都需要向最佳做法看齊。

sentences.english: They should look east for a cure.
sentences.chinese: 它們應該向東方看齊，尋求靈藥。

sentences.english: Tradition with a need for it to the people-not the same.
sentences.chinese: 傳統都帶有某種必要性，使人們非向它看齊不可。

sentences.english: For leveling with highly civilized society out of 38 US states and Japan?
sentences.chinese: 爲了和除美國38個州和日本以外的高度文明看齊？

sentences.english: Exect Gorman to decide that Morgan Stanley should be a lot more like trader Goldman Sachs, after all.
sentences.chinese: 預計戈爾曼會決定最終要向交易商高盛看齊。

sentences.english: He told the soldiers to dress to the left.
sentences.chinese: 他要求士兵們向左看齊。

definition: to step in/to stride forward/to forge ahead
to expand/to enlarge/to broaden one's scope
to fight for/to strive for/to win over
to go forward/to forge ahead/to advance/onward
railtrack connection/to integrate into sth/to dock/to connect/to be in step with/to bring into line with/to align
